sentences.en: A written submission has to be prepared.
sentences.cn: 必须准备一份书面报告。

sentences.en: Diploma and certificate courses do not normally require the submission of a dissertation.
sentences.cn: 为获得文凭和证书所修的课程通常不需要提交论文。

sentences.en: He is not the kind of child who is likely to be cowed into submission.
sentences.cn: 他并不是那种吓一吓就可能就范的孩子.

sentences.en: Her present submission is animated solely by her fear of punishment.
sentences.cn: 她目前的屈从完全是因为她害怕受罚.

sentences.en: I demand the submission of the signature to an expert.
sentences.cn: 我要求把这签名提交专家鉴定.

sentences.en: No enemy can frighten us into submission.
sentences.cn: 任何敌人的恐吓都不能使我们屈服.

sentences.en: Plans were drawn up for submission to the housing council.
sentences.cn: 计划已起草，要提交给住房委员会。

sentences.en: Submissions will not be accepted after May.
sentences.cn: 过了5月再提交将不予接受。

sentences.en: The army intends to take the city or simply starve it into submission.
sentences.cn: 军队打算占领该城市或干脆截断其粮食补给迫使其投降。

sentences.en: The conquerors believed in crushing the defeated people into submission , knowing that they could not win their loyalty by the victory.
sentences.cn: 征服者们知道他们的胜利并不能赢得失败者的忠心,于是就认为只有通过武力才能将他们压服.

sentences.en: The deadline for the submission of proposals is May 1st.
sentences.cn: 呈交提案的最后期限是 5 月 1 日。

sentences.en: The defeated general showed his submission by giving up his sword.
sentences.cn: 战败将军缴剑表示投降.

sentences.en: Their approach simply bludgeons you into submission.
sentences.cn: 他们的方法就是迫使你屈服。

sentences.en: They believe that submission in no way implies inferiority.
sentences.cn: 他们认为服从决不意味着低人一等.

sentences.en: Was she going to try to bulldoze him into submission?
sentences.cn: 该死的东西!她想把他压服 吗 ?

sentences.en: We think an attempt to bully them into submission would be counterproductive.
sentences.cn: 我们认为试图迫使他们屈服会适得其反。

words.tran_cn: 连接主句和从句的；从属的
使服从（subordinate的ing形式）；使成为下级
投降；[计]提交（物）；服从；（向法官提出的）意见；谦恭

trans.tran_cn: 投降，屈服，服从，谦恭，柔顺，提交，呈递
trans.tran_en: the state of being completely controlled by a person or group, and accepting that you have to obey them
